Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Crispy \Crisp"y\ (-?), a. 1. Formed into short, close ringlets; frizzed; crisp; as, crispy locks. [1913 Webster]
2. Crisp; brittle; as, a crispy pie crust. [1913 Webster]
crispy adj : tender and brittle; "crisp potato chips" [syn: {crisp}] [also: {crispiest}, {crispier}]
